snippet: If Nadal beats Gaël Monfils in the final, he will win his ninth Monte Carlo title and will equal a record set by Novak Djokovic with his 28th Masters title....
lead_paragraph: If Nadal beats Gaël Monfils in the final, he will win his ninth Monte Carlo title and will equal a record set by Novak Djokovic with his 28th Masters title.
abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats Andy Murray to advance to final of Monte Carlo Masters tennis tournament; other tennis matches noted.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Tops Andy Murray in Monte Carlo Semifinal
headline.print_headline: Nadal Tops Murray in Monte Carlo Semifinal
